product_overview: A web application module for schools allowing teachers to create and publish quizzes, and students to participate in computer-based tests (CBT) with secure authentication and user management.
core_goals: Enable teachers to create, manage and publish quizzes for their classes.
Provide students with an easy interface to take quizzes and view their dashboards.
Allow admins to manage student lists and overall dashboards.
Ensure secure login and authentication using JWT secrets.
Support efficient attendance taking by teachers.
key_features: Teacher QuizBuilder to create quizzes with titles, descriptions, duration, and question details including multiple choice and theory types.
Student QuizPlayer to fetch quizzes by ID and allow students to take quizzes with question retrieval.
Admin dashboard capabilities to manage student lists and monitor overall performance.
Authentication system implementing JWT for secure login and role-based access.
Teacher attendance management functionality integrated within settings.
user_flow_summary: Admin logs in and manages student lists and dashboards via the admin panel.
Teacher logs in, takes attendance, configures settings, and creates quizzes through the QuizBuilder API.
Teacher publishes quizzes to classes, making them available for students.
Student logs in securely, views their dashboard, and accesses assigned quizzes.
Student fetches quiz details and questions, answers them, and submits for evaluation.
Results and progress are reflected in student dashboards.
validation_criteria: Teachers can successfully create, update, and publish quizzes through the API.
Students can retrieve quiz details and questions and submit answers without errors.
Admin can manage student lists and view dashboards accurately.
Authentication via JWT works securely across all user roles.
Attendance records can be taken and viewed correctly by teachers.
UI components respond correctly in the React/Next.js frontend using TailwindCSS.

features.description: API for teachers to create manual quizzes.
